name: Running Cube
description:
Running Cube is an arcade-style dodge-the-obstacles game. It has multiple levels and unique tutorials for all of the mechanics. New mechanics/features will be introduced over time and implemented into new levels.

Everything is free:

Everything about the game is free, meaning the game is free-to-play, there are no microtransactions, and anything else meaning free.

Multiple levels:

As far as the latest version goes, there are 10 levels. The goal is to have 100 levels by the end of the game.

Tutorials:

There are tutorials for every feature there is so far. The current features are:

Starting at level 1: Basics, moving left and right.

Starting at level 6: Jumping over obstacles.

Known bugs:
  • Level 6 instantly completes (Fix will be released next update)
Learn more!
